mode.description_zh: 通知栏模式，可选值为 `closeable` link

left-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the left is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
left-icon.description_zh: 左侧图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

scrollable.description: Whether to enable scrolling playback is enabled by default when the content length overflows
scrollable.description_zh: 是否开启滚动播放，内容长度溢出时默认开启

wrapable.description: Whether to enable text wrapping takes effect only when scrolling is disabled
wrapable.description_zh: 是否开启文本换行，只在禁用滚动时生效

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Reset the notification bar to its initial state
methods.description_zh: 重置通知栏到初始状态

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on the notification bar

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the notification bar is closed

events.name: repla
events.description: Triggers whenever the scroll bar starts scrolling again
events.description_zh: 每当滚动栏重新开始滚动时触发

slots.name: left-icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the left

slots.name: right-icon
slots.description: Customize the icon on the right
